status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ermir","text":"To purify GFP-FIP200(CTR), as described previously (Turco et al. 2019 Mol Cell, PMID: 30853400), fuse the C-terminal domain of FIP200 (1458-1594aa)  to a N-terminal 6xHis-TEV-GFP-tag through cloning into a pET-DUET1 vector (available on Addgene). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ai67","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"50usf","text":"After the transformation of the pET-DUET1 vector encoding 6xHis-TEV-GFP-FIP200(CTR) in E. coli Rosetta pLysS cells (Novagen Cat# 70956-4), grow cells in 2x Tryptone Yeast extract (TY) medium at   until an OD600 of 0.4 and then continued at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":207,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":194,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":240,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6r032","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"59u5s","text":"Once the cells reached an OD600 of 0.8, induce the protein expression with   isopropyl β-D-1-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG) for    at   . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":28,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":75,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":126,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":133,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bsagl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":57600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b2940","text":"Pellet the beads by centrifugation and the supernatant, concentrate containing the GFP-FIP200(CTR) protein using a 30 kDa cut-off Amicon filter (Merck Millipore) and load onto a pre-equilibrated Superdex 200 Increase 10/300 GL column (Cytiva).
